All of them will be close to and make offerings to the Buddha, because of circumambulating the stupa.

Or becoming the king of the Heaven of the Thirty-three, with wife and children complete,
With powerful and sovereign authority, this is due to circumambulating the stupa to the right.
Or becoming a brahman, upholding the precepts and well-versed,
